channel.title: Projects on Tutas
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Tutas

item.title: (ART) Duat
item.description: Play it here. Participation in the DRPGGameJam2024 as an artist, mostly doing 3D environments and final boss 3D model. 3D Models and textures for environments. First model for the snake boss fight. Early version of the snake boss texture. Final textured version of the snake boss.

item.title: (GODOT) gnUNO
item.description: Find it here! Networked UNO game made in Godot using the built-in networking tools. Running over ENET, using RPCs for synchronizing the UNO game state, and using Godot’s Network Synchronizer and Network Replicator for synchronizing hand movement. First attempt at human looking model. First multiplayer test, only the hands were moveable. Close to final gameplay, with aesthetic touches. Customization options.

item.title: (GODOT) olcPoker
item.description: Find it here! Networked Poker game made in Godot using the built-in networking tools. Running over ENET, using RPCs for synchronizing the whole game’s state.

item.title: (Unity) Tetris
item.description: Playable version found here. Simple game in Unity, relying on shaders for coloring blocks and with modern tetris features such as DAS (Delayed Auto Shift) and ARR (Auto Repeat Rate).

item.title: (C++) 3D Roguelike
item.description: Find it here. This project consists in an ascii renderer of a 3d world in C++ and LIBTCOD. The world is seen from a kind of cavalier prespective. Early Iteration of the renderer. Early version wtih harsh shadows. After learning about gamma correction and tweaking values. First person rendering system writen a year later. Current Features Map generation using noise; Entity system. Map rendering
